```{r}
state.freq <- table(Breweries$State)
barplot(state.freq[order(state.freq)], 
        horiz = T,
        border = NA,
        xlim = c(0, 100),
        main = "Number of Breweries per State",
        xlab = "Number of Brewiews",
        ylab = "States")
```
